Introduction

Just a simple linear programming problem I came across while playing Final Fantasy XV Comrades. Uses the PuLP library in Python to minimize experience needed to fulfill weaponsâ€™ leveling requirements.

Furture improvements

  • Creating a dynamic webapp using Javascript.
  • Generating a database containing all evolvable weapons.
  • Adding options to calculate with Cid buffs.
